description.title: Visibility Config: subscribe, public event, one EOA in event can view
description.purpose:
Uses a simple guessing game, with VisibilityConfig.eventLogConfigs[0].isPublic set to false, and topic1CanView set to true. This is set for one event within the contract, the Guessed event. Two gateway connections are used, the first by a dev user that deploys the contract and the second by a player of the game. The dev user has a subscriber to the events, and should be able to see the events given the EOA of the Guessed event is topic1 and has been made public.
Skipped due to https://github.com/ten-protocol/ten-internal/issues/3933 (may be related)
